name: Quest For Glory II: Trial By Fire
description: Uses the files from the Windows installer from GOG.
notes: Audio (MIDI and sound FX) should work without additional setup.
content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the GOG installer
- file2: https://constexpr.org/innoextract/files/snapshots/innoextract-1.9-dev-2019-09-22/innoextract-1.9-dev-2019-09-22-linux.tar.xz
game:
  config_file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosboxQG2.conf
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $file2
- execute:
    args: -d "$CACHE/app" "$file1"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/app
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX
    src: $GAMEDIR/__support/app/dosboxQG2_single.conf
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX
    src: $GAMEDIR/__support/app/dosboxQG2.conf
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosboxQG2.conf
    key: aspect
    section: render
    value: true
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosboxQG2.conf
    key: output
    section: sdl
    value: overlay
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosboxQG2.conf
    key: fullscreen
    section: sdl
    value: false
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosboxQG2.conf
    key: fullresolution
    section: sdl
    value: 1920x1080
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosboxQG2.conf
    key: midiconfig
    section: midi
    value: '128:0'
main_file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosboxQG2_single.conf
